name: S. K Construction
overview:
Established in the year 1980, we, “S. K Construction Chemical Company”, are an ISO 9001:2008 accredited organization, which is facilitating clients with unparalleled Water Proofing, Coating, Grouting and Wrapping Services. Clients can avail services like Epoxy Grouting Services, Injection Grouting Services, Brick Bat Works, Under Ground Water Tank Proofing Services and Glass Fibre Wrapping Services.

Our Team: Semi skilled laborers Administrative personnel Skilled technicians Engineers Fabricators

Our Quality: leveraging on our quality-conscious approach, we have been able to touch the zenith of success in rendering Water Proofing, Coating, Grouting and Wrapping Services. While executing each project, we stringently adhere to globally laid quality norms and industry guidelines.

Domain Expertise: We are known for rendering best-in-class Water Proofing, Coating, Grouting and Wrapping Services to the customers. Ever since our establishment, our firm is engaged in providing repair, rehabilitation, retrofitting and refurbishing solutions for civil and infrastructure projects to the patrons.

Why Us?: Quality-assured services Economical pricing policy Reputed clientèle, in home Expedite delivery of consignments Strong focus on customer delight

Clientele: Being a customer-centric organization, we put striving efforts to acquire the complete satisfaction of patrons. For the same, we are offering a reliable set of Water Proofing, Coating, Grouting and Wrapping Services. We render the offered services keeping the requirements of patrons in mind. Further, our professionals ensure the execution of undertaken projects within the promised time frame. Our patrons can avail offered services from us at competitive prices.
